      • isSshSudoSupported

        public boolean isSshSudoSupported()
        Returns whether running SSH interpreter as root via sudo is supported or not.

      • isConnectionTypeSupported

        public boolean isConnectionTypeSupported(CredentialsType type)
        Returns whether editing of SDK with specified CredentialsType is supported or not.

        Certain remote interpreters (e.g. PHP, Python, Ruby, etc.) may or may not support SDK with certain credentials type (e.g. Docker, Docker Compose, WSL, etc.).

        Parameters:
        type - credentials type to check
        Returns:
        whether editing of SDK is supported or not
